attributes.action: Terminate Internet Access, Mobile Phone Access and Financial funding of all Prison Inmates and those on Parole in the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to withdraw from all prison inmates and those on parole internet and mobile phone access and any financial support that they are presently entitled to through taxpayers funding for these services due to the hurt and malicious comments they impose upon their victims through the use of these means while under sentence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
